metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9536 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In numerous functions of libFDK, there are possible out of bounds writes due to incorrect bounds checks. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-9. Android ID: A-112662184

criterions.comment: fdkaac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
